channel.title: A Bug Slowing down my server
channel.description:
This is annoying me so much.. Last night my server was running perfectly and nothing strange then this came up.. and kept coming up whenever I turned the server on :@ And its slowing down the server alot!
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2iigwll.png[/img]
Then After seing that, I wrote down the ip in Ipbans.txt So now its ip banned BUT its still slowing down the server with
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2ai90p.png[/img]
Anyone gotta a solution
-Waves, eXtrosion

item.title: A Bug Slowing down my server
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“pwnedurmom, post:12, topic:232416”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=306085.msg2452410#msg2452410 date=1222029230]
Confabulations, you’re getting nulled.
[/quote]
no shit? But that fucking ip isn’t real. I pinged it and got nothing.
And don’t come back with some sassy-ass remark like “wow you noob you don’t ping ip adress.” because it works.[/quote]
I was stating the obvious. And i wasn’t being a smart arse you little prick.

Read full topic

item.title: A Bug Slowing down my server
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

dude i downloaded and ran delta-scape and got the same message only it wasn’t after a while, i put my regular server up and now ever 10 mins i get

[client-1]connection accepted from 69.2.207.1.

or somthing close to that but it creats a null on my server but the connecton never logs in and you can’t ipban it but sence i have meiscooldude’s tut added everytime it reaches to nulls the connection is rejected.

this has been going on for like 2 weeks. It’s not laggin my server it’s just anyoing cause it’s taking up a thread.

Read full topic
item.source: A Bug Slowing down my server

item.title: A Bug Slowing down my server
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Its somebody crashing your server,
Theres no point ipbanning them,

They can still null you.

Read full topic

item.title: A Bug Slowing down my server
item.dc:creator: @eXtrosion eXtrosion
item.description:
@eXtrosion wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:6, topic:232416”]Thats the deltascape anti-leech feature.

You will need to find out yourself how to get rid of it[/quote]

No it’s not… I already got rid of the anti-leach… And the server was running fine… but then like 2 weeks later this came up…

Read full topic
